verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir A Song מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, [or] Psalm לִבְנֵ֫י <WH1121> liv-Nei for the sons קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach to the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon מָחֲלַ֣ת <WH4257> ma-cha-Lat upon Mahalath לְעַנּ֑וֹת <WH6031> le-'an-Not; Leannoth מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> mas-Kil, Maschil לְהֵימָ֥ן <WH1968> le-hei-Man of Heman הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <WH250> ha-'ez-ra-Chi. the Ezrahite יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Ti; of my salvation יוֹם־ <WH3117> yom- day צָעַ֖קְתִּי <WH6817> tza-'Ak-ti I have cried בַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> val-Lay-lah [and] night נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5048> neg-De-cha. before

תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo come לְ֭פָנֶיךָ <WH6440> Le-fa-nei-cha before תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti; Let my prayer הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> hat-teh- thee incline אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <WH241> 'a-ze-ne-cha, thine ear לְרִנָּתִֽי׃ <WH7440> le-rin-na-Ti. unto my cry

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for שָֽׂבְעָ֣ה <WH7646> sa-ve-'Ah is full בְרָע֣וֹת <WH7451> ve-ra-'ot of troubles נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; For my soul וְחַיַּ֗י <WH2416> ve-chai-Yai, and my life לִשְׁא֥וֹל <WH7585> lish-'ol unto the grave הִגִּֽיעוּ׃ <WH5060> hig-Gi-'u. draweth nigh

נֶ֭חְשַׁבְתִּי <WH2803> Nech-shav-ti I am counted עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- among י֣וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> Yor-dei with them that go down ב֑וֹר <WH953> Vor; into the pit הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti, have כְּגֶ֣בֶר <WH1397> ke-Ge-ver I am as a man אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- without אֱיָֽל׃ <WH353> 'e-Yal. [that hath] no strength

בַּמֵּתִ֗ים <WH4191> bam-me-Tim, among the dead חָ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH2670> cha-fe-Shi Free כְּמ֤וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo Like חֲלָלִ֨ים׀ <WH2491> cha-la-Lim like the slain שֹׁ֥כְבֵי <WH7901> Sho-che-vei that lie קֶ֗בֶר <WH6913> Ke-ver, in the grave אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Whom לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no זְכַרְתָּ֣ם <WH2142> ze-char-Tam whom thou rememberest ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; more וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah, from מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> mi-ya-de-Cha from thy hand נִגְזָֽרוּ׃ <WH1504> nig-Za-ru. no more and they are cut off

שַׁ֭תַּנִי <WH7896> ta-ni Thou hast laid בְּב֣וֹר <WH953> be-Vor pit תַּחְתִּיּ֑וֹת <WH8482> tach-ti-Yot; me in the lowest בְּ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <WH4285> be-ma-cha-shak-Kim, in darkness בִּמְצֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH4688> bim-tzo-Lot. in the deeps

עָ֭לַי <WH5921> 'A-lai and סָמְכָ֣ה <WH5564> sa-me-Chah lieth hard חֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2534> cha-ma-Te-cha; Thy wrath וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all מִ֝שְׁבָּרֶ֗יךָ <WH4867> mish-ba-Rei-cha, [me] with all thy waves עִנִּ֥יתָ <WH6031> 'in-Ni-ta upon me and thou hast afflicted סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

הִרְחַ֥קְתָּ <WH7368> hir-Chak-ta far מְיֻדָּעַ֗י <WH3045> me-yud-da-'Ai, mine acquaintance מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni at שַׁתַּ֣נִי <WH7896> shat-Ta-ni from me thou hast made תוֹעֵב֣וֹת <WH8441> to-'e-Vot me an abomination לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; כָּ֝לֻ֗א <WH3607> ka-Lu, unto them [I am] shut up וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and cannot אֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> 'e-Tze. and I cannot come forth

עֵינִ֥י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni Mine eye דָאֲבָ֗ה <WH1669> da-'a-Vah, mourneth מִנִּ֫י <WH4480> min-Ni because עֹ֥נִי <WH6040> 'O-ni by reason of affliction קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <WH7121> ke-ra-Ti-cha I have called יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol every י֑וֹם <WH3117> Yom; daily שִׁטַּ֖חְתִּי <WH7849> shit-Tach-ti upon thee I have stretched out אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha out כַפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> chap-Pai. my hands

הֲלַמֵּתִ֥ים <WH4191> ha-lam-me-Tim to the dead תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ta-'a-seh- Wilt thou shew פֶּ֑לֶא <WH6382> Pe-le; wonders אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo רְ֝פָאִ֗ים <WH7496> re-fa-'Im, ;shall the dead יָק֤וּמוּ׀ <WH6965> ya-Ku-mu arise יוֹד֬וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha [and] praise סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. thee;Selah

הַיְסֻפַּ֣ר <WH5608> hay-sup-Par be declared בַּקֶּ֣בֶר <WH6913> bak-Ke-ver the grave חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; Shall thy lovingkindness אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> 'e-mu-na-te-cha, your faithfulness בָּאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <WH11> ba-'a-vad-Don. destruction

הֲיִוָּדַ֣ע <WH3045> ha-yiv-va-Da' be known בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> ba-Cho-shech dark פִּלְאֶ֑ךָ <WH6382> pil-'E-cha; Shall thy wonders וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-te-cha, justice בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land נְשִׁיָּֽה׃ <WH5388> ne-shi-Yah. forgetfulness

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD שִׁוַּ֑עְתִּי <WH7768> shiv-Va'-ti; But unto thee have I cried וּ֝בַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> u-vab-Bo-ker, and in the morning תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti shall my prayer תְקַדְּמֶֽךָּ׃ <WH6923> te-kad-de-Me-ka. prevent

לָמָ֣ה <WH4100> la-Mah why יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD תִּזְנַ֣ח <WH2186> tiz-Nach why castest thou off נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; any תַּסְתִּ֖יר <WH5641> tas-Tir be absent פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thou thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. at

עָ֘נִ֤י <WH6041> 'a-Ni I [am] afflicted אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I וְגֹוֵ֣עַ <WH1478> ve-goyE-a' and ready to die מִנֹּ֑עַר <WH5290> min-No-'ar; from [my] youth נָשָׂ֖אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti up [while] I suffer אֵמֶ֣יךָ <WH367> 'e-Mei-cha thy terrors אָפֽוּנָה׃ <WH6323> 'a-Fu-nah. I am distracted

עָ֭לַי <WH5921> 'A-lai over עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ru goeth over חֲרוֹנֶ֑יךָ <WH2740> cha-ro-Nei-cha; Thy fierce wrath בִּ֝עוּתֶ֗יךָ <WH1161> bi-'u-Tei-cha, me thy terrors צִמְּתוּתֻֽנִי׃ <WH6789> tzim-me-tu-Tu-ni. have cut me off

סַבּ֣וּנִי <WH5437> sab-Bu-ni They came round about כַ֭מַּיִם <WH4325> Cham-ma-yim like water כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; me daily הִקִּ֖יפוּ <WH5362> hik-Ki-fu they compassed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai and יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> Ya-chad. me about together

הִרְחַ֣קְתָּ <WH7368> hir-Chak-ta hast thou put far מִ֭מֶּנִּי <WH4480> Mi-men-ni at אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> 'o-Hev Lover וָרֵ֑עַ <WH7453> va-Re-a'; and friend מְֽיֻדָּעַ֥י <WH3045> me-yud-da-'Ai from me [and] mine acquaintance מַחְשָֽׁךְ׃ <WH4285> mach-Shach. into darkness
